name: Plagued Station 2
description:
Plagued Station 2 is a short, difficult Metroidvania made within 1 week for GBJAM 7.

IN PLAGUED STATION II, YOU CAN:

- Be startled by incredibly fast birds.

- Take a trip to hell and back.

- Get horribly lost and frown with displeasure.

- Jump with style.

CONTROLS

ENTER   - START

ARROWKEYS - D-PAD

Z  -  B BUTTON

X -  A BUTTON

Made for GBJAM7 by Robin Field

With additional music by Billy Hobson

Thanks for playing!
